questions.quote: Oh, Elaine, we've covered all of that in the catalogue ad nauseum. No, I would like this book to be about my day-to-day life.
Kramer? Have you seen George, around? I can't get a hold of him.
Morning Thunder has caffeine in it, Jerry doesn't drink caffeine.
Now! Now, George! Turn on the faucet! George, turn on the faucet! Hoochie mama! Hoochie mama! Hoochie mamamaaaaa!
Oh, alright ah well... There's a priest, a minister and a rabbi, and they're all staring at him....
Well, it's not a beauty contest. It's just a way for people to get to know one another.
Oh boy, that looks great. I can't believe you're giving him this.
Come on up. Oh, it's Elaine, she's just a friend of mine. I don't know what she's doing here now.  I'm sorry. What?
You got hookers turning tricks in my car. How's that for starters.
Uh.. well, you better not. I'm supposed to be careful with it.
